name: Old Games
description:
My first games. 

Turrets was my absolute first ever game. Very simple, kind of weird.

The Adventures of Super Bean was my first platformer. It tried to do a lot of stuff, and I never actually finished it. It's cute

Super Bean Advanced was the game I made after playing Super Meat Boy for the first time. It's too hard and the platforming physics leaves a lot to be desired.

TxT God was the game I made after playing Minecraft for the first time. It's very weird, and I think the first game I ever made with all (or mostly) GML. You collect power-ups to be able to place and destroy different blocks. A cute idea but not very fun.

DIP was the game I made after playing the Knytt games for the first time. It was a multi-year endeaver and was never finished due to a crash. It's only missing music for the Gravity Castle though. It's very hard but kind of fun.
